_comment: Claude Desktop config for mcpvectordb running as a local container (HTTP mode).
The container must be running before Claude Desktop connects.
Start it: docker compose -f deploy/local/docker-compose.yml up -d
See deploy/local/README.md for full setup instructions.
The 'url' key uses Claude Desktop's native streamable-http transport.
No ALLOWED_HOSTS configuration needed: safe for loopback-only traffic.
If you changed MCP_PORT in .env (e.g. to avoid a port conflict), update
the port number in the url below to match.
